name: Micralyne Inc.
tag_list: microfabrication-company, mems-manufacturer, mems-optical-products, foundry-services, thin-films-deposition, micromachining--mems-solutions, microfluidic-device-development
overview: Micralyne Inc., one of the largest MEMS manufacturers, is a profitable and growing company headquartered in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. Micralyne is involved in MEMS micromachining and has leading expertise in surface micromachining and bulk micromachining.
